languages.text: {n}Пальцы Маражая сжимаются на вашем подбородке и поднимают вам голову.{/n} "Остатки Опустошительной бури склонились передо мной, увидев, что даже за пределами Паутины я не утратил свой авторитет. Думаю, ты заслужил{mf||а} небольшой подарок от меня".

{n}Marazhai's fingers grip your chin and force your head up.{/n} "The remains of the Reaving Tempest bowed down before me when they saw that I had not lost my authority even beyond the bounds of the Webway. I think you have earned a small gift from me."
languages.original_text: {n}Пальцы Маражая сжимаются на вашем подбородке и поднимают вам голову.{/n} "Остатки Опустошительной бури склонились передо мной, увидев, что даже за пределами Паутины я не утратил свой авторитет. Думаю, ты заслужил{mf||а} небольшой подарок от меня".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai's fingers grip your chin and force your head up.{/n} "The remains of the Reaving Tempest bowed down before me when they saw that I had not lost my authority even beyond the bounds of the Webway. I think you have earned a small gift from me."

{n}Marazhai's fingers grip your chin and force your head up.{/n} "The remains of the Reaving Tempest bowed down before me when they saw that I had not lost my authority even beyond the bounds of the Webway. I think you have earned a small gift from me."

{n}Marazhai's fingers grip your chin and force your head up.{/n} "The remains of the Reaving Tempest bowed down before me when they saw that I had not lost my authority even beyond the bounds of the Webway. I think you have earned a small gift from me."

{n}Marazhai's fingers grip your chin and force your head up.{/n} "The remains of the Reaving Tempest bowed down before me when they saw that I had not lost my authority even beyond the bounds of the Webway. I think you have earned a small gift from me."

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋捏住你的下巴，逼你抬起头来。{/n}“即便是在网道之外，我也依然保持着我的权威。狂风阴谋团的残党看到了这个事实，于是在我面前俯首称臣。我猜，你已经从我这里赢得了一件小小的礼物。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's fingers grip your chin and force your head up.{/n} "The remains of the Reaving Tempest bowed down before me when they saw that I had not lost my authority even beyond the bounds of the Webway. I think you have earned a small gift from me."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋捏住你的下巴，逼你抬起头来。{/n}“即便是在网道之外，我也依然保持着我的权威。狂风阴谋团的残党看到了这个事实，于是在我面前俯首称臣。我猜，你已经从我这里赢得了一件小小的礼物。”

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは指であなたのあごを掴むと、クイッと顔を上にあげる。{/n}「略奪の嵐の残党は、網辻の境界を越えても俺の権威が衰えないのを見て、俺の前にひれ伏した。お前にはささやかなプレゼントをやってもいい」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's fingers grip your chin and force your head up.{/n} "The remains of the Reaving Tempest bowed down before me when they saw that I had not lost my authority even beyond the bounds of the Webway. I think you have earned a small gift from me."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは指であなたのあごを掴むと、クイッと顔を上にあげる。{/n}「略奪の嵐の残党は、網辻の境界を越えても俺の権威が衰えないのを見て、俺の前にひれ伏した。お前にはささやかなプレゼントをやってもいい」

languages.text: {n}Los dedos de Marazhai se cierran en torno a tu barbilla y te obligan a levantar la cabeza.{/n} «El remanente de la Tempestad Asoladora se inclinó ante mí cuando vieron que no había perdido mi autoridad ni siquiera más allá de los confines de la Telaraña. Creo que te has ganado un pequeño regalo».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's fingers grip your chin and force your head up.{/n} "The remains of the Reaving Tempest bowed down before me when they saw that I had not lost my authority even beyond the bounds of the Webway. I think you have earned a small gift from me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los dedos de Marazhai se cierran en torno a tu barbilla y te obligan a levantar la cabeza.{/n} «El remanente de la Tempestad Asoladora se inclinó ante mí cuando vieron que no había perdido mi autoridad ni siquiera más allá de los confines de la Telaraña. Creo que te has ganado un pequeño regalo».

languages.text: {n}Les doigts de Marazhai se referment sur votre menton et vous obligent à relever la tête.{/n} « Les vestiges de la Tempête ravageuse se sont prosternés devant moi dès qu'ils ont vu que je n'avais rien perdu de mon autorité, même par-delà les frontières de la Toile. Vous avez bien mérité un petit cadeau en retour. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's fingers grip your chin and force your head up.{/n} "The remains of the Reaving Tempest bowed down before me when they saw that I had not lost my authority even beyond the bounds of the Webway. I think you have earned a small gift from me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les doigts de Marazhai se referment sur votre menton et vous obligent à relever la tête.{/n} « Les vestiges de la Tempête ravageuse se sont prosternés devant moi dès qu'ils ont vu que je n'avais rien perdu de mon autorité, même par-delà les frontières de la Toile. Vous avez bien mérité un petit cadeau en retour. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai greift nach deinem Kinn und drückt deinen Kopf hoch.{/n} "Der verbliebenen Mitglieder des plündernden Sturms verneigten sich vor mir, als sie sahen, dass ich meine Autorität selbst außerhalb der Grenzen des Netzes der Tausend Tore nicht verloren hatte. Deswegen habt Ihr Euch ein kleines Geschenk verdient."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's fingers grip your chin and force your head up.{/n} "The remains of the Reaving Tempest bowed down before me when they saw that I had not lost my authority even beyond the bounds of the Webway. I think you have earned a small gift from me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai greift nach deinem Kinn und drückt deinen Kopf hoch.{/n} "Der verbliebenen Mitglieder des plündernden Sturms verneigten sich vor mir, als sie sahen, dass ich meine Autorität selbst außerhalb der Grenzen des Netzes der Tausend Tore nicht verloren hatte. Deswegen habt Ihr Euch ein kleines Geschenk verdient."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın parmakları, çeneni kavrayarak başını zorla yukarı kaldırıyor.{/n} "Müfteris Kasırga'dan geriye kalanlar, Ağyol Geçidi sınırlarının ötesinde bile itibarımı kaybetmediğimi gördüklerinde önümde diz çöktü. Sanırım benden küçük bir hediyeyi hak ettin."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's fingers grip your chin and force your head up.{/n} "The remains of the Reaving Tempest bowed down before me when they saw that I had not lost my authority even beyond the bounds of the Webway. I think you have earned a small gift from me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai'ın parmakları, çeneni kavrayarak başını zorla yukarı kaldırıyor.{/n} "Müfteris Kasırga'dan geriye kalanlar, Ağyol Geçidi sınırlarının ötesinde bile itibarımı kaybetmediğimi gördüklerinde önümde diz çöktüler. Sanırım benden küçük bir hediyeyi hak ettin."
